duties_responsibilities.duty: Support existing storage infrastructure and design the next version of the infrastructure
Collaborate with engineering, architecture, and product management to create platform features
Participate in an 'On Call' rotation to support the platform 24X7
Ensure ISO, Fed RAMP, and PCI information security compliance
Plan and execute expansion to support rapid transaction growth
Work with operations team to manage, install, and configure servers in multiple data centers

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
